name: Create a new row in a Microsoft 365 Excel workbook from a new survey response in Survey123
description:
Every time a new response is submitted in Survey123, a new row will be instantly created in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet.

This template was created based on a survey with these questions:
1) Full Name
2) Email
3) Phone number
4) Describe your problem

Our target worksheet had these columns:
1) Date time
2) Full name
3) Email
4) Phone number
5) Describe your problem

You can use your own survey/spreadsheet with different questions but you will need to update the mappings in the Excel module.
